STATIC_heading.text: REVIEW SHEET

STATIC_text.text: Check your answers with the information in the chapter or in the Glossary (Medical Word Parts—English) at the end of the book.
Instructions: Click or tap on the plus sign to reveal the opposite side of the card.

questionContent.questionText:
A. Uterus and fallopian tubes are imaged (x-ray procedure).

[hysterosalpingography]

B. hCG is measured.

[pregnancy test]

C. X-ray images are taken of the breast.

[mammography]

D. Procedure to biopsy breast tissue.

[fine needle aspiration]

E. Removal of cervical and vaginal cells for analysis.

[Pap test]

F. Fluid is obtained from the region between the rectum and the uterus.

[culdocentesis]

G. Images of the region of the hip are obtained using sound waves.

[pelvic ultrasonography]

H. Microscopic visual examination of the vagina and cervix.

[colposcopy]

instructions.instructions: Match each description with the correct diagnostic procedure.

STATIC_text.text: Please visit the Evolve website for additional exercises, games, and images related to this chapter.
